com.facebook.infrastructure.io
Interface ICompactSerializer<T>

All Known Subinterfaces:
ICompactSerializer2<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
MembershipCleaner.MembershipCleanerMessageSerializer, RequestCountSampler.CardinalitySerializer, StreamContextManager.StreamContextSerializer, StreamContextManager.StreamStatusMessageSerializer, StreamContextManager.StreamStatusSerializer, TokenUpdater.TokenInfoMessageSerializer
public interface ICompactSerializer<T>

Allows for the controlled serialization/deserialization of a given type. Author : Avinash Lakshman ( alakshman@facebook.com) & Prashant Malik ( pmalik@facebook.com )
